duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, configure, and maintain database management systems (DBMS) such as SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, etc.
Develop and enforce data governance policies and standards to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.
Implement and manage data security measures, including access controls, encryption, and authentication.
Design, develop, and maintain data integration workflows and ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes.
Participate in designing and implementing data architecture, including data models and schemas.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data analysts, data scientists, developers, and business stakeholders.
Create and maintain documentation for data processes, procedures, and configurations.
Monitor data-related system performance and generate reports to identify trends and areas for improvement.
Manage relationships with data-related vendors, including software providers and service providers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
